site.title: ULTEX - Your e-logistics gateway
site.description: ULTEX powers your international logistics and import-export operations with end-to-end, high-performance solutions.
site.ogDescription: From sourcing to delivery, ULTex secures every link of your cross-border supply chain.

home.title: ULTEX - Your e-logistics gateway
home.description: Comprehensive logistics services, secure import-export, and tailored support for your global flows.
home.ogDescription: Optimise your worldwide operations with ULTex: sourcing, transport, customs, warehousing and delivery.

about.title: About ULTex
about.description: Learn about ULTex's story, values and dedicated team driving your international logistics projects.
about.ogDescription: A Moroccan team committed to connecting your commercial ambitions with strategic global markets.

solutions.title: Logistics and import-export solutions
solutions.description: Integrated offerings covering sourcing, quality control, transport, customs transit and last-mile delivery.
solutions.ogTitle: ULTex solutions | Tailored supply chain services
solutions.ogDescription: Secure every stage of your international supply chain with ULTex custom logistics solutions.

events.title: ULTex events and news
events.description: Follow ULTex at trade shows, forums and professional gatherings dedicated to logistics and supply chain.
events.ogTitle: ULTex events | Logistics forums & trade shows
events.ogDescription: Stay up to date with ULTex news and events focused on logistics, import-export and supply chain innovation.

resources.title: Logistics resources and market insights
resources.description: Guides, studies and practical advice to improve your logistics operations and international commerce.
resources.ogDescription: Access exclusive ULTex resources to keep a competitive edge across global logistics trends.

contact.title: Contact ULTex
contact.description: Reach out to our logistics experts to launch an import-export project or optimise your global flows.
contact.ogTitle: Contact ULTex | Let's discuss your logistics
contact.ogDescription: Talk with ULTex for bespoke logistics support and accelerate your international growth.
